title: Verona prepares its ancient arena for the Olympics closing ceremony on Sunday
description: Verona hosts the Milan Cortina Winter Games closing ceremony in its ancient Arena di Verona on Sunday. About 1,500 athletes will parade into the arena,...

title: Open letter: The EU’s new sustainable investment plan needs to be completely fossil expansion-free
description: Copublished with WWF and 133 organisations Fully excluding new fossil fuel projects from the revised Sustainable Finance Disclosure Regulation (SFDR) is critical to achieving the EU’s climate commitments, safeguarding the integrity of the framework, and strengthening investor confidence, warn 133 organisations and experts in a new multi-stakeholder letter. The letter, signed by civil society organisations, financial institutions, academics, and experts, urges the European Parliament asks the European Parliament and EU Member States [...]The article Open letter: The EU’s new sustainable investment plan needs to be completely fossil expansion-free first appeared on Reclaim Finance.

title: The history of the umbrella from ancient parasols to iconic British brollies
description: Have you been enjoying the weather? Even the ducks look fed up! What a start to the year!
